title: [FSX-P3D] - AEROSOFT - Twin Otter X Extended - v1.11.rar
description:
The Aerosoft's Twin Otter Extended v1.11 cracked, fully working and ready to install on Prepar3d.

Installation:
=============

1. Open temporary files folder

("DRIVE:Documents and SettingsUser NameLocal SettingsTemp" in Windows XP 
 
 "DRIVE:UsersUser NameAppDataLocalTemp" in Windows Vista or later 
  
  
  OR Press (Win+R) - Type %TEMP% in the dialogue box which has opened - Press Enter).

2. Start installation by running the setup file.
   
   (Run the installer as administrator if you are using Windows Vista or later).

3. Select your language.

4. Go back to the temporary folder you have just opened at Step 1. 
   
   Two new folders must have been created. 
   
   Sort the folders in your temp folder by creation date.
   
   Open the last created folder (or the second last folder in some cases), and then open its subfolder.

5. Copy & Overwrite the "ascrypt_pro.dll" in the opened folder with the same file from the "Crack" folder.

6. Proceed with the installation now, leaving Registration e-mail & Serial empty.

7. Do NOT install the Aerosoft Launcher (Uncheck the Box) at the end of setup and click Finish.

8. If you are asked, restart your computer.

9. Run and install Hotfix 1-3 Complete to fix the bugs present in Twin Otter X Extended v1.11.

The aircraft is ready for use now. Enjoy!
